name: A Moderator Murder
description: A Moderator Murder is Eloqi's submission for Deynum's The Completion Jam. By the way you play as Eloqi if it isn't clear. They all said that a PowerPoint game would be awful and... yeah they were right. But it's not as bad as you thought so go play it. And I did try to add sounds so could you give me at least one pity point for that please? Thanks! Oh and by the way, I got permission from everyone to use them as characters other than Leshem - which is why his part is so small. He didn't actually say 'no' though so Leshem, do tell me if you're not okay with this and I'll take you out. : )
